title: Shiff Hardin LLP, outside legal counsel bills, CPS

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Shiff Hardin LLP, outside legal counsel bills, CPS
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Since July 1, 2019 through current:

1) Copies of all invoices from the Schiff Hardin LLP also known as ArentFox Schiff LLP;

2) Copies of records of payments by CPS/Chicago Board of Education to Schiff Hardin LLP (aka ArentFox Schiff). I want the actual bills as well as proof of payment by the district.

3) Any and all letters of engagement between CPS/Chicago Board of Education and Schiff Hardin LLP (ArentFox Schiff), including any modifications or changes.

Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

Thank you.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Red Light Camera Enforcement System - Doral, FL

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Red Light Camera Enforcement System - Doral, FL
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Evaluation notes related to ALL proposers, Submitted responses of ALL proposers, and Debrief documents related to ALL proposers related to RFP #2022-10. I believe the contract was won by Red Speed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Kory Saulnier

title: Anthony Kunasek medical examiner's report - Kunasek suicide - Gunshot to the head self-inflicted

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Anthony Kunasek medical examiner's report - Kunasek suicide - Gunshot to the head self-inflicted
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All materials forwarded to the State's Attorneys Office by the medical examiner concerning the death/suicide of Anthony Kunasek on or about 4/30/2022.  These materials were forwarded pursuant to F.S. 406.13 to the State's Attorney and pursuant to F.S. 119.011(1) these documents are public records freely available to the public.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

scott huminski
